Title: Developer Senior AI (GenAI)
Description:
A Alter Solutions Portugal é uma empresa de Consultoria em Tecnologia da Informação, catalisadora da Transformação Digital, integrante do grupo Alter Solutions criado em 2006, em Paris.

Em 2022, a Alter Solutions integrou o grupo act digital, constituindo uma comunidade global de talento em Tecnologia, com presença em doze países: Alemanha, Bélgica, Brasil, Canadá, Estados Unidos da América, Marrocos, Espanha, França, Luxemburgo, Polónia, Portugal e Sérvia. Também em 2022, fomos certificados como um Great Place to Work©.

Em Portugal, contamos com 120 clientes e uma equipa de 500 pessoas, a trabalhar em projetos de setores tão diversos como Banca, Seguros, Transportes, Aviação e Energia.

Sede do centro de IT Nearshore, conta com uma equipa dedicada com cerca de 30 profissionais especializados, integrados em projetos com diversos clientes de renome internacional.



Descrição do emprego



Estamos à procura de um Developer Senior especializado em Inteligência Artificial (GenAI) para se juntar à nossa equipa em Alfragide. Este profissional terá um papel crucial no desenho e desenvolvimento de soluções de GenAI, colaborando com equipas multidisciplinares para criar soluções inovadoras e de alto desempenho.

Requisitos:

Sólidos conhecimentos em Inteligência Artificial e Machine Learning, com foco em algoritmos de GenAI.
Experiência comprovada no desenho e desenvolvimento de soluções de GenAI.
Profundo conhecimento e experiência em programação com Python.
Experiência no desenvolvimento e integração de APIs.
Conhecimentos em arquitetura em AI (LLM). - OBRIGATÓRIO
Conhecimento prático dos princípios de DevOps e MLOps, incluindo o desenvolvimento de pipelines CI/CD, utilização de Docker ou Kubernetes, e ferramentas de versionamento.
Experiência em trabalhar com a cloud Azure, com um enfoque particular nos serviços de AI.
Capacidade para converter requisitos de negócio em especificações técnicas detalhadas.


Qualificações



Responsabilidades:

Participar no desenho da arquitetura de soluções de GenAI.
Desenvolver soluções complexas de GenAI, assegurando a sua otimização para desempenho, escalabilidade e eficiência.
Colaborar com equipas multidisciplinares para garantir a integração e implementação eficaz das soluções de GenAI.
Desenvolver provas de conceito (POCs) em GenAI para demonstrar viabilidade e inovação.
Fornecer orientação técnica e mentoria a membros mais juniores da equipa, promovendo um ambiente de crescimento e aprendizagem contínua.

Requisitos Adicionais:

Disponibilidade para trabalhar no escritório em Alfragide 3 dias por semana.
Experiência prática com Kubernetes, Docker e Python tanto no backend quanto no frontend.

Se está interessado em trabalhar numa equipa dinâmica e tem paixão por desenvolver soluções avançadas de IA, envie-nos a sua candidatura!

Title: Mobile Developer
HTML:
O BiG é um Banco nacional especialista em Poupança e Investimento, com presença em Portugal, Espanha e Moçambique.

Imagina-te a fazer o que sempre gostaste e a ter uma carreira na área da Banca de Investimento… Imagina-te no BiG !

Pretendemos recrutar, um(a) candidato(a) para integrar a equipa de Informática do BiG.

Responsabilidades

  • Desenhar e implementar aplicações complexas para as plataformas Android e iOS;
  • Propor e implementar testes automáticos (unit, funcional, coded-ui/ end-to-end);
  • Propor e implementar evoluções nas aplicações existentes;
  • Contribuir na Gestão e manutenção das aplicações.

Requisitos mínimos

  • Formação superior em Tecnologias de Informação ou equivalente;
  • Experiência profissional comprovada na construção de aplicações Mobile em Flutter;
  • Experiência na integração de APIs RESTful e JSON;
  • Conhecimentos de desenvolvimento de aplicações nativas Android e iOS.
  • Conhecimentos de implementação de segurança em Apps Mobile;
  • Conhecimentos de .Net C#;
  • Disponibilidade, flexibilidade e grande capacidade de autonomia;
  • Rigor, organização e dinamismo;
  • Facilidade de relacionamento interpessoal;
  • Capacidade de organização e planeamento.

Valorizamos

  • Vontade de aprender;
  • Gosto por trabalhar em equipa;
  • Boa capacidade de comunicação;
  • Pensamento critico e boa capacidade de resolução de problemas.

Oferecemos

  • A cultura do BiG assenta na meritocracia, havendo constantes oportunidades de evolução e progressão de carreira, mediante a performance individual e coletiva;
  • Integração numa empresa sólida, exigente e com ambiente jovem, dinâmico e desafiador;
  • Formação inicial e contínua;
  • Programa de Mentoria para novos colaboradores;
  • Oportunidade de fazer parte de uma empresa em constante evolução e crescimento

No BiG evoluímos com a opinião de todos. A tua opinião pode fazer a diferença.

Title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
Description:
Job Description

Responsibilities - your mission


Work with domain experts, data scientists and AI specialists to accelerate ML/AI into production
Developing ML systems, considering all aspects of the ML product lifecycle including model training, deployment, monitoring, and validation
Support architecture discussions on integration of AI/ML in existing IM applications
Deploy and maintain both software and ML systems in multi-cloud and on-prem environments
Help define software engineering and MLOps best practices to be adopted across the business


Requirements - our ideal candidate will have


Bachelor's or Master’s degree (or equivalent) in a STEM subject
Experience in one or more programming and/or scripting languages such as Python, Node.js, Java, etc.
Familiarity with CI/CD and DevOps principles
An understanding of software design & architecture
An understanding of statistics and machine learning (eg deep learning, convolutional neural networks, generative AI etc.)
Familiarity with cloud environments such as AWS or GCP
Fluent in written and spoken English
Strong problem solving, communication, and collaboration skills


Preferred Requirements


An understanding or experience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Familiarity with agile development principles
An understanding of MLOps and the machine learning product life cycle
Familiarity developing software or infrastructure for scalable systems
Prior experience with optimizing machine learning algorithms
Experience designing, building, and operating machine learning solutions, leveraging specific machine learning architectures
Have strong communication skills and ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


Benefits - What’s In It For You


The chance to work in a multicultural environment.
The opportunity to grow your skills and capabilities thanks to our Airbus learning offer (digital solutions, classroom sessions, certified training....) and career opportunities across the globe.
A hybrid working model, allowing you to combine onsite and offsite work.
A modern office at Parque das Nacoes, well connected to public transportation.
A motivated and fun crew to grow and build and shape the GBS together.
An intense and exciting onboarding experience.
Work in a balanced environment: Beyond the many benefits offered to its employees, joining Airbus is also the guarantee of a respectable work-life balance. At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly. Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.


Your Application

Airbus offers a wide variety of competitive benefits and development opportunities. If you meet the requirements of this unique opportunity, and you have the "Passion to Innovate" and the "Power to Change", we encourage you to apply now.

This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Company’s success, reputation and sustainable growth.

By submitting your CV or application you are consenting to Airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. This information will only be used by Airbus.

Airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. We welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief.

Airbus is, and always has been, committed to equal opportunities for all. As such, we will never ask for any type of monetary exchange in the frame of a recruitment process. Any impersonation of Airbus to do so should be reported to emsom@airbus.com.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Queremos fazer diferente com o essencial.

Apostamos numa estratégia de corporativismo sustentável. Acreditamos que o sucesso se baseia na construção de uma equipa centrada no bem-estar coletivo, no desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional, e assente numa filosofia de trabalho que potencie a gestão saudável das nossas vidas. Work-life balance, beginner’s mind e community involvement são a nossa identidade, os nossos fundamentos e a nossa cultura.




O que precisas para te juntares a nós:




- Experiência mínima de 3 anos em desenvolvimento com Python;

- Experiência com Kubernetes e Containers;

- Nível C1 de Português;




-> Notas importantes:

Projeto remote em Portugal







O que temos para te oferecer:




- Gestão de Talento personalizada. Valorizamos e privilegiamos um acompanhamento próximo e regular, somos uma equipa desde o primeiro dia.

- Pacote de benefícios amplo e flexível. Seguro de saúde, seguro de vida e acidentes pessoais, descontos e benefícios, plano de telecomunicações e muito mais.

- Apostamos na formação e na tua carreira. Formação certificada, plataformas de formação online, centro de exames Pearson VUE... Apostamos em ti!

- Sustentabilidade e envolvimento comunitário. Queremos dar significado ao nosso trabalho e investir num projeto de consultoria inclusivo. Para isso, precisamos da tua ajuda.




team.it, back to basics!

Juntas-te a nós?







Na Team IT defendemos a igualdade e valorizamos a diversidade.

Criamos um ambiente seguro, diversificado e onde as oportunidades são iguais para todos!

Não discriminamos com base em idade, etnia, orientação sexual, género, deficiência ou qualquer fator que não seja o mérito.

Todas as candidaturas com competências para o cargo são bem-vindas!

Title: (Senior) Data Scientists - based in Luxembourg
Description:
The positions are based at our Luxembourg headquarters and require regular office presence. The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.

The EIB, the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate - Group Digital Office (GCS-GDO) – Data & Information Solutions Department (DIS) - Data Management Division (DM) - Analytics & Reporting Solutions Unit (A&R) at its headquarters in Luxembourg, (Senior) Data Scientists*.

These are full-time positions at grade 5/6 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.


internal benchmark: (Senior) IT Applications Officer


Purpose

You want to be part of our AI innovation lab to build the future using cutting-edge technologies such as deep learning, natural language processing and computer vision. We are looking for excellent team spirit, proactive attitude, as well as a passion for data…. As a member of our lab, you will have the opportunity to promote the latest advancements in the AI industry and deliver AI-powered solutions across various business domains. You will also work with a diverse and talented team of researchers, engineers and analysts who share the same passion and enthusiasm.

Operating Network

You will report to the Head of Unit and work in close cooperation with other IT units and counterparties from all directorates using AI services and solutions. There will be a lot of interaction with key stakeholders such as software vendors, providers of outsourced services, peer groups, consultants in order to optimise service levels and stay abreast of best practice.

Accountabilities


Establish a governance framework with the user community to ensure an effective use of the AI solutions & services within the organisation. Monitor its applicability’s and propose improvements to maximize value.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business challenges and opportunities where AI solutions can provide strategic value within the banking domain.
Design and conduct experiments to validate model performance, accuracy, and robustness, ensuring the highest quality of AI solutions.
Analyse business specifications, implement and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, enhance decision-making processes, and automate tasks in accordance with the IT policies.
Collaborate with other IT teams to integrate AI solutions seamlessly into existing IT landscape and processes.
Ensure compliance with regulatory guidelines such AI Act and data security standards while handling sensitive customer information.


Qualifications


University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Technology, Physics, Mathematics, Statistics, or related quantitative field
At least 5 years’ of IT professional experience with at least 2 years in building and deploying AI/ML/GenAI solutions
Python programming experience with machine learning libraries such as scikit-learn, XGboost, Keras, Pytorch, Spacy or equivalent
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience with implementation NLP and LLM based solutions using models like transformers, GPT 3.5,4 or Langchain or equivalent
Experience in Front-end development with Next.js, React is an advantage
In-depth understanding of machine learning techniques, probabilistic modelling, natural language processing
Knowledge of cloud technologies, such as Microsoft Azure Cloud, AWS or Databricks
Familiarity with banking and financial data structures, as well as an understanding of regulatory requirements and challenges within the industry would be an asset
Good knowledge of project management principles, methods, and practices
Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (*), with a good command of the other. Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage.


Competencies

Find out more about EIB core competencies here

(*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.

We are an equal opportunities employer, who believes that diversity is good for our people and our business. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation/identity, disability or neurodiversity.

Applicants with specific needs are encouraged to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.

By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.

Deadline for applications: This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.

The EIB, the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate - Group Digital Office (GCS-GDO) – Data & Information Solutions Department (DIS) - Data Management Division (DM) - Analytics & Reporting Solutions Unit (A&R) at its headquarters in Luxembourg, (Senior) Data Scientists*.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Description:
Company




Jimpisoft and CarPro Systems are leading software providers for fleet management, within the rental, leasing and mobility sectors. The business offers a cloud-based SaaS platform, which acts as the backbone for partners to digitalise their processes and manage all aspects of their vehicle operations. With customers in close to 100 countries, and a fleet of 1,000,000 vehicles, CarPro and Jimpisoft have become the partners of choice for global brands such as Volkswagen Financial Services, Enterprise Holdings, Europcar, Hertz and many other leading mobility players.

The companies were acquired by two INSEAD graduates in 2020 and the company is looking to scale up the Product Team to power the future growth of the company.




Profile of the candidate




We are seeking a self-driven and autonomous AI Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing an AI module to integrate with our existing B2B application, which is built on .NET and Microsoft technologies. The AI module aims to enhance user efficiency and productivity. This role requires excellent communication skills, accountability, and the ability to work independently with minimal supervision. The AI Engineer will collaborate closely with the VP of Technology and the Product Manager for support and guidance.




Key Responsibilities:




• Design, develop, and implement AI modules to integrate with the existing .NET-based B2B application.

• Identify opportunities for AI to enhance user experience and streamline application usage.

• Develop algorithms and models that address specific business needs and improve application functionality.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and ensure seamless integration.

• Work with SQL databases to manage and manipulate data as needed for AI model training and deployment.

• Test, validate, and optimize AI models to ensure high performance and accuracy.

• Provide technical support and troubleshooting for AI-related issues.

• Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.

• Document AI development processes, methodologies, and integration procedures.




Qualifications:




• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

• Proven experience as an AI Engineer or similar role for +3 years.

• Strong knowledge of machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and deep learning.

• Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++.

• Experience with AI/ML frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).

• Familiarity with .NET and Microsoft technologies.

• Experience working with SQL databases.

• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

• Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

• Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex AI concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

• High level of accountability, energy, and dynamism.




Preferred Qualifications:




• Experience with natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision.

• Prior experience in developing AI solutions for B2B applications.

• Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and AI services.




Key Attributes:




• Self-driven and Autonomous: Ability to work independently without constant supervision.

• Great Communication Skills: Effective verbal and written communication skills, able to interact with various stakeholders.

• Good Energy and Dynamism: High energy and enthusiasm for AI and technology.

• Accountability: Strong sense of responsibility and reliability.




What We Offer:




• Competitive salary and benefits package.

• Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI technologies.

• Support from a highly experienced VP of Technology and Product Manager.

• Dynamic and fast-paced work environment.

• Opportunities for professional growth and development.




LOCATION: Lisbon, on-site position

Title: Machine Learning & Prompt Engineer
Description:
Job Description

Responsibilities - your mission


Work with domain experts, data scientists and AI specialists to accelerate ML/AI applications into production
Developing ML systems, considering all aspects of the ML product lifecycle including model training, deployment, monitoring, and validation
Support architecture discussions on integration of AI/ML in existing IM applications
Deploy and maintain both software and ML systems in multi-cloud and on-prem environments
Help define software engineering and MLOps best practices to be adopted across the business
Participate in HR AI use cases analysis & feasibility studies
Work with other HR digital teams to make the best use of HR data and systems


Requirements - Our Ideal Candidate Will Have


Bachelor's or Master’s degree (or equivalent) in a STEM subject
Experience in one or more programming and/or scripting languages such as Python, Node.js, Java, etc.
Familiarity with CI/CD and DevOps principles
Knowledge of NLP, embeddings and LLMs
An understanding of software design & architecture
An understanding of statistics and machine learning (eg deep learning, convolutional neural networks, Generative AI etc.)
Familiarity with cloud environments such as GCP or AWS
Fluent in written and spoken English
Strong problem solving, communication, and collaboration skills


Preferred Requirements


An understanding or experience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Familiarity with agile development principles
An understanding of MLOps and the machine learning product life cycle
Familiarity developing software or infrastructure for scalable systems
Prior experience with optimizing machine learning algorithms
Experience designing, building, and operating machine learning solutions, leveraging specific machine learning architectures
Have strong communication skills and ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


Benefits - What’s In It For You


Diverse career opportunities within Airbus European core countries or in other regions around the world.
A hybrid working model, allowing you to combine onsite and offsite work.
A modern office well connected to public transportation.
A motivated and fun crew to grow and build and shape the GBS together.
An intense and exciting onboarding experience.


This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Company’s success, reputation and sustainable growth.

Company

Airbus Portugal SA

Employment Type

Permanent

Experience Level

Professional

Job Family

Digital

By submitting your CV or application you are consenting to Airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. This information will only be used by Airbus.

Airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. We welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief.

Airbus is, and always has been, committed to equal opportunities for all. As such, we will never ask for any type of monetary exchange in the frame of a recruitment process. Any impersonation of Airbus to do so should be reported to emsom@airbus.com.

At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly. Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

Title: AI Developer
Description:
You'll be focused in


Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into AI/ML solutions
Designing, developing and deploying AI models and algorithms for tasks such as classification, regression, clustering, and recommendation
Preprocess and analyze large datasets to extract meaningful features and insights for model training
Experiment with different machine learning techniques and algorithms to improve model performance and accuracy
Implement and optimize AI/ML models for scalability, efficiency, and real-time inference
Conducting rigorous testing and validation of AI models to ensure robustness, reliability, and generalization
Staying updated on the latest advancements in AI/ML research, frameworks, and tools, and evaluate their applicability to our projects



In order to succeed, you’ll need


Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or comparable work experience
Proven experience working as a AI Developer or related role
Hands-on experience in building and deploying AI models and generative AI models in production environments
Experience in programming languages commonly used in AI/ML development, such as Python
Strong experience in machine learning algorithms, techniques, and frameworks, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn
Experience with cloud platforms and related AI/ML services including generative AI technologies
Strong communication and analytical skills
Great English skills, both written and spoken



About The Product

Our AI Center of Excellence (CoE) is dedicated to empowering and advancing AI technology within the organization. Our mission is to drive AI innovation and adoption, ensuring our organization stays at the forefront of technological advancements.

Company Benefits


1200€ to equip your home office
720€ gross/year home allowance
Performance bonus
Health insurance extendable to your household
Wellbeing program extendable to your household
Life insurance
Pension fund
Smartphone & Unlimited phone data plan
Discounts on VW Group cars and special financing conditions
Relocation package & Visa process sponsorship (if applicable)



Cool Things You’ll Experience In Our Work Environment


Tailored remote-friendly setup for every team's vibe!
Flexible working hours
Multicultural reality with + 30 different nationalities
Pet friendly environment
Boost your career with our internal mobility program, focused on your personal & professional growth
Mix and mingle across teams for idea-sharing and bonding



About VWDS

Technology-driven trends such as diverse mobility, electrification and connectivity will revolutionize the mobility industry in the next decade. Volkswagen Group, as world leader in the automotive industry, is setting the pace for this revolution.

At Volkswagen Digital Solutions (VWDS) we are the go-to team to tackle complex systems and programming challenges. We make sure that our products flow smoothly in all stages of the digital value chain.

Our main areas of focus: vehicle software & operations, mobile online services, IT security, fleet management, sales & after sales, purchasing & logistics and product portfolio management.

Ready to #ExploreNewRoads? Join us! 🚗

Title: Data Scientist (AWS, Lisbon)
HTML:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.

YOUR ROLE

  • Loading data onto the Big Data platform;
  • Targeted preparation of data for specific use cases and creation of data profiles;
  • Exploratory analysis of the data;
  • Targeted data analyses with regard to defined questions;
  • Project management and advising the departments on the feasibility and interpretation of special issues;
  • Series-production readiness of use cases for stable productive use;
  • Coordination of the service provider's activities.

YOUR PROFILE

  • More than 3 years of experience;
  • English (Advanced/Fluent);
  • Experience with AWS cloud (such as: S3, Glue, Athena, Lambda);
  • Confident handling of the programming languages Apache Spark (Must have), Python;
  • Understanding statistical methods and learning systems;
  • Deep knowledge of data mining and machine learning, deep learning, clustering, recommendation, classification;
  • Several years of experience in data analysis and multivariate statistics.

What You’ll Love About Working Here

  • Join a multicultural and inclusive team environment
  • Enjoy a supportive atmosphere promoting work-life balance
  • Engage in exciting national and international projects
  • Hybrid work
  • Your career growth is central to our mission. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professionals are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities
  • Training and certifications programs
  • Health and life insurance
  • Referral program with bonuses for talent recommendations
  • Great office locations

About Capgemini

Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.

Apply now!

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Job Title: Python Developer

Location: Lisbon - Hybrid

Salary: €60,000 - €65,000




With a commitment to leveraging the latest advancements in technology, my client are at the forefront of developing solutions that optimize operations and enhance strategic planning. As they continue to expand their capabilities, they are seeking a talented and passionate Python Developer (Data Scientist) to join their dynamic and forward-thinking team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work with state-of-the-art technologies and make a significant impact on the company's advanced analytics and optimization efforts. If you are looking to take your career to the next level and work in an environment that values innovation, collaboration, and professional growth, this could be the perfect opportunity for you.




Key Responsibilities:




Develop and Maintain Python Frameworks: Design, develop, and maintain robust Python frameworks and functions using libraries such as Pandas, RxPy, SciPy, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Focus on creating scalable and high-performance solutions.




Lead Advanced Analytics and Model Development: Spearhead the development of advanced analytics and machine learning models to drive forecasting and inventory optimization. Utilize deep learning and statistical techniques to achieve high levels of accuracy and efficiency.




Scalability and Performance Optimization: Ensure the scalability and performance of all developed solutions, leveraging best practices in coding, testing, and deployment.




Collaboration and Leadership: Work closely with cross-functional teams, providing technical leadership and expertise in data science and Python development. Mentor junior developers and data scientists, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.

Requirements:




Technical Expertise: Strong proficiency in Python and experience with relevant libraries (Pandas, RxPy, SciPy, TensorFlow, PyTorch).




Analytical Skills: Proven ability to develop advanced analytical models for forecasting and optimization, using both deep learning and traditional statistical methods.




Performance Focus: Demonstrated experience in optimizing the performance and scalability of data-driven applications.




If you are interested in finding out more, please APPLY & get in touch with Charlie Bennett @ Allegiance Technology

Analytical Skills: Proven ability to develop advanced analytical models for forecasting and optimization, using both deep learning and traditional statistical methods.


Performance Focus: Demonstrated experience in optimizing the performance and scalability of data-driven applications.


If you are interested in finding out more, please APPLY & get in touch with Charlie Bennett @ Allegiance Technology

Title: Python Developer
HTML:
A Job? Or a Lifetime Experience? Start Yours Here!

Somos uma consultora tecnológica portuguesa, com foco nas pessoas e na criação de relações de affinidade. Reconhecida pela Deloitte Technology Fast 500 por dois anos consecutivos e distinguida pela FT 1000 e INC Europe 5000, a Affinity conta com 10 anos no mercado, mais de 300 colaboradores, escritórios em Lisboa, Porto e Óbidos e projetos em +20 países.


Acreditamos que grandes pessoas fazem empresas de sucesso e por isso mesmo defendemos a valorização, reconhecimento e crescimento dos nossos profissionais.


Não queremos ser mais uma linha do teu CV, queremos que connosco vivas uma Lifetime Experience. Apostamos em formações e certificações que confirmam a tua real progressão, na promoção de um saudável work-life balance e na oferta de benefícios com impacto na tua vida pessoal e carreira.


#welcometoyourfuture


O que precisas de ter:

· Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática ou Similar (valorizado);

· Experiência em desenvolvimento com Python, preferencialmente com Flask;

. Valorizado experiência no desenvolviment de API`S com FastAPI

· Experiência com base de dados relacionais (preferência por SQL Server);

· Bons conhecimentos de inglês - B2 ou superior;


O que esperamos de ti:


·Vontade de exceder expectativas, as próprias e as definidas pela Affinity;

·Skills extraordinárias e ânimo para adquirir mais algumas;

· Boa capacidade de te relacionares com pessoas (e não apenas com tecnologias, linguagens e plataformas), espírito de equipa e boa disposição;

· Autonomia, proatividade e foco (mesmo under pressure);

· Obsessão por fazer bem e capacidade de priorizar;

· Versatilidade (podes ser adepto do BYOD ou não).

· Capacidade de inovar e de evoluir num mercado em constante mutação.


O que te vai animar:


· Integrar uma empresa em crescimento com uma cultura baseada nos relacionamentos, no valor humano e na eficiência;

· Oportunidades de desenvolvimento e carreira diretamente proporcionais ao teu desempenho e motivações;



Do you think you’re the one we are looking for?

Aproveita para nos conhecer e acompanhando em:


https://www.instagram.com/affinityportugal/

https://www.linkedin.com/company/2701281/admin/

https://www.facebook.com/affinity.portugal/

https://twitter.com/WithAffinity

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
hackajob is a matching platform partnering with Tripadvisor helping them to hire the best talent and build the future. To get the chance to get matched to this role and other similar roles, click on Apply to set up your free profile.




TripAdvisor, Inc. is an American online travel company that operates a website and mobile app with user-generated content and a comparison shopping website. It also offers online hotel reservations and bookings for transportation, lodging, travel experiences, and restaurants. Travellers across the globe use the Tripadvisor site and app to discover where to stay, what to do and where to eat based on guidance from those who have been there before. Their workplace is for everyone, as is their people powered platform. Tripadvisor is seeking people that bring their unique identities, abilities, and experiences, so they can collectively revolutionize travel and together find the good out there.




They believe that they are better together, and at Tripadvisor they welcome you for who you are. Their workplace is for everyone, as is their people powered platform. At Tripadvisor, they want you to bring your unique identities, abilities, and experiences, so they can collectively revolutionize travel and together find the good out there.




The Tripadvisor Data Science Team is looking for an exceptional experienced Senior Machine Learning Engineer to help lead the design and implementation of next generation systems to help their users discover, iterate, and execute on their travel plans. Their Trip Planning team is focused on recommendation, personalization, explanation, and enhanced user interaction across multiple business verticals including Tripadvisor Experiences, Accommodations, and Restaurants. As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer working in this space, you will have the opportunity to apply your modeling and engineering skills to a number of different areas, with a particular focus on recommendations, generative AI, NLP, and system design.




Tripadvisor is the web's leading travel information site. At Tripadvisor, the Data Science and ML Team creates systems that influence the travel decisions of millions of people per day. It applies cutting edge machine learning techniques to a wide variety of areas, including recommenders, computer vision, and natural language processing. To ensure continued success, Tripadvisor promotes a culture of personal development, including social activities, journal clubs, memberships in online learning resources, and participation in industry conferences. Have a great time while shaping the future of travel!




What You Will Be Doing:




Seek out new opportunities to apply data science and machine learning to the business (e.g., personalized recommendations, NLP, customer modeling) across all channels (e.g., Web, email, paid marketing)
Work with other teams in solving problems and identifying opportunities
Lead the design of machine learning models to solve a variety of core business problems in customer acquisition, retention, and reactivation
Automate ETL pipelines
Prototype, evaluate, deploy and maintain new models in production
Design AB tests and analyze their results
Discover new ways to analyze and interpret the data
Communicate progress and interpretation of experimental results to technical and business stakeholders
Lead the determination of next steps for each project.




Qualifications:




PhD or Masters in Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, or related field preferred
Strong software engineering skills
Experience with Recommender Systems
Experience with Natural Language Processing
Experience with LLM prompt engineering
Strong background in machine learning and statistics
Solid foundation on data structures and algorithms
Proficiency in Python for numerical/statistical programming (our group relies heavily on Pandas/Numpy/Scikit-learn/PyTorch)
Ability to write complex SQL queries
Experience with big data technologies, such as Snowflake and Spark
Knowledge of AB test design and analysis
Track record of leading the deployment and maintenance of models
At least 3 years of relevant, practical experience.




Nice to Haves:




Experience with online businesses.

Show more

Title: Data Engineer / Data Scientist (M/F) – Hybrid (Lisbon)
Description:
Match Profiler is an Information Systems consulting firm, working in the national and international market since 1999. We are empowered with multidisciplinary competences and know-how in IT, which allow us to contribute, optimize and move forward with our clients.Match Profiler is an Information Systems consultant who has been working in the national and international market since 1999. We have multidisciplinary skills and IT know-how that allow us to contribute, optimize and progress with our clients. We are currently recruiting, for integration in our internal team/client, professionals with the following profile: Data Engineer / Data Scientist (m/f) – Hybrid (Lisbon)What do you need to have: Hard Skills:Experience with ELT tools of Azure Experience with Integration tools of Azure Experience building Azure data warehouses and/or data lakes Experience with data visualization tools Experience integrating systems through APIs Experience shipping models to services that run on the cloud and get applied to multiple terabytes of data a day. Experience building solutions/analytics for supply chain. Cloud and services experience, with Azure cloud experience highly desirable. Excellent analytical skills with systematic and structured approach to software design Azure Data warehouse Data wrangling Data modeling DevOps Advanced SQL data governance principles Python, Jupyter, scikit-learn, pytorch/tensorflow and/or other deep learning framework.Soft skills


Good communication
Team spirit
Proactivity
Time managementWhat we can offer:
Personalized support from your team
Your manager will take into consideration your motivations and suggestions
Victories will be celebrated together
Your HR and Support Teams will always be available to help
Constant feedback on your work
A network of hundreds of partnerships with companies from numerous sectors that offer you exclusive discounts (health, well-being, travel, gastronomy, culture, leisure, training, etc)
And, of course, many gatherings and social eventsTo respond to this opportunity, send us your CV to the following e-mail address ******#J-18808-Ljbffr

Title: Python Developer (m/f)

// Bee motto

if (me.dareToChange() == true) { me.sendCV(); me.happy(true); }

Somos uma consultora de tecnologias de informação com foco em projetos de Engenharia associados às Tecnologias da Informação. Atuamos em dois eixos principais: OTS e DxSpark, concentrando o que fazemos de melhor em cada um deles. Contamos com uma equipa diversa, de cerca de 200 profissionais, apaixonados e comprometidos em transformar desafios em oportunidades.

Entra em contato connosco e embarca nesta jornada rumo ao sucesso, aqui vais encontrar o teu próximo desafio #daretochange.

Dare To Have

  • Curso superior em Engenharia Informática é valorizado;
  • Mínimo 3 anos de experiência em desenvolvimento web com Python;
  • De preferência com a framework Django;
  • Experiência em REST API;
  • Fluência em Inglês, Francês ou Espanhol é valorizado.

Dare To Live

Global Mindset | integração numa empresa internacional de rápido crescimento;

Continuous Learning | plano de formação e certificação gratuitas em tecnologias, metodologias, línguas e soft-skills;

Infinite Feedback | acompanhamento e progressão de carreira;

Health | Seguro de saúde, dentário e seguro de vida;

Partnerships| benefícios e descontos em restaurantes, ginásios, viagens, farmácias e muito mais;

One to one | valorizamos a comunicação aberta entre todos;

Celebrations| celebramos juntos perto ou longe e com prendas especiais;

Referral Program | programa de referência de colegas e amigos;

Stack| portátil, pacote de dados e kit de boas-vindas;

Diversity| Na Bee Engineering valorizamos a diversidade, defendemos a equidade e empenhamo-nos em criar um ambiente seguro, baseado no espírito de equipa e entreajuda. Estamos comprometidos em desenvolver práticas promotoras da igualdade de oportunidades e em combater a discriminação;

Sustainability & CSR | Enquanto empresa, temos um plano estratégico de ações definido, assente nos objetivos de desenvolvimento sustentável (Agenda 2030, ONU), com o objetivo de nos movermos de forma responsável e contribuirmos para um mundo mais sustentável e justo.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!




We are looking for an Amazing: Python Developer

Seniority: mid-level

Type of position: Hibrid

The amazing you, will have:




Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or similar;
+3 years of experience as Python developer;
Proficiency in Python and its libraries, frameworks, and tools;
Solid understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices;
Experience with Django or Flask is a plus;
Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.
Familiarity with database systems, including SQL and NoSQL databases.
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Fluent in English (mandatory)
Must be in Lisbon (mandatory)










Why should you become part of our family?

You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!







Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Show more

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Lisbon)
Description:
Hi there!

We are Capgemini Engineering. A brand part of the Capgemini Group.

We have the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, diversity, inclusion, a purpose of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can learn more about Capgemini Engineering here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MZ0Z6PjdnQo.

You can help us to achieve our mission!

Now, we are part of Capgemini Group and we have more than 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries, and we work with sectors such as aeronautics, automotive, communications, energy, life sciences, software & internet, space & defense and consumer products.

Your Mission

Capgemini Engineering is constantly growing and attentive to market opportunities and in search of the best professionals to join its team. We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team, on a hybrid format, with the possibility of participating in many interesting and cutting-edge projects through the whole life-cycle.

Your Role

A Senior Data Scientist exhibits expert-level understanding and execution of data science projects with a strategic impact on the organization. Responsibilities include:


Leadership and mentorship to teams of data scientists and analysts, guiding them to success on intricate data science initiatives.
Defining the strategic direction for data science projects, ensuring alignment with business goals and objectives.
Conducting advanced analysis of complex datasets to derive profound insights, forecast trends, and pinpoint opportunities for improvement.
Designing, implementing, and evaluating advanced statistical models and machine learning algorithms to address high-impact business challenges.
Lead the integration of big data technologies and advanced analytics solutions into business processes, driving innovation in methodologies and practices.
Establishing best practices for data management, quality, and governance to ensure the integrity and reliability of data science outputs.
Effectively communicating complex analytical concepts and the value of data science initiatives to stakeholders at all levels, including executive leadership.
Advocating for a culture of data-driven decision-making and continuous learning within the organization.


Your Profile


7 or more years of experience in data science and analytics, with a proven track record of leading successful data science projects.
Proficiency of programming languages, including Python and SQL, along with advanced libraries and frameworks like TensorFlow or Pytorch.
Possess a deep understanding of statistical analysis, machine learning, predictive modeling, and advanced algorithmic problem-solving.
Showcase extensive experience in data visualization and interpretation, translating complex results into actionable insights.
Exhibit leadership experience with the ability to inspire, guide, and mentor team members to achieve exceptional results.
Possess technical domain knowledge in cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) or big data technologies (Spark).
Have exceptional communication and collaboration skills, with fluency in English and the ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.


What we Offer

Our Famous Atmosphere


There’s always someone happy to start the day with a cup of coffee with you – even virtually!
We are a big company with a unique atmosphere – we make friendships, share important moments, and… simply like each other!


A Lot Of Benefits


Referral bonuses for recommending your friends to Capgemini Engineering.
Continuous training on Next*
Offices in a great location
Participation in international projects
Integration in a multinational company
Career Evolution


Location:


Lisbon full-time and hybrid


We inform you that our recruitment process is 100% remote

Apply Now!


Show more

  • Exhibit leadership experience with the ability to inspire, guide, and mentor team members to achieve exceptional results.
  • Possess technical domain knowledge in cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) or big data technologies (Spark).
  • Have exceptional communication and collaboration skills, with fluency in English and the ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.

What we Offer

Our Famous Atmosphere

  • There’s always someone happy to start the day with a cup of coffee with you – even virtually!
  • We are a big company with a unique atmosphere – we make friendships, share important moments, and… simply like each other!

A Lot Of Benefits

  • Referral bonuses for recommending your friends to Capgemini Engineering.
  • Continuous training on Next*
  • Offices in a great location
  • Participation in international projects
  • Integration in a multinational company
  • Career Evolution

Location:

  • Lisbon full-time and hybrid

We inform you that our recruitment process is 100% remote

Apply Now!

Title: Data Scientist / OCR specialist
Description:
Job overview:


Location: Fully remote, EU timezone (CET +/- 2hours)
Start date: ASAP
Languages: French is mandatory
Experience: Minimum 5 years
Our client: Saas building an MVP with OCR technology



Job Summary:

The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing OCR solutions to extract text and data from images and documents. This role requires expertise in OCR technologies and a strong programming background.

Job Responsibilities:


Development of OCR Algorithms:
Design and implement OCR algorithms to accurately extract text and data from various sources like images and scanned documents.
Optimize algorithms for speed, accuracy, and reliability.

Integration with Applications:
Integrate OCR solutions with existing applications and systems to automate data extraction processes.
Collaborate with software developers to ensure seamless integration of OCR functionalities.

Selection of OCR Tools:
Evaluate and choose appropriate OCR tools and libraries based on project requirements.
Stay updated on the latest OCR technologies and tools in the industry.

Training and Testing:
Train OCR models using machine learning techniques to enhance recognition accuracy.
Conduct thorough testing and validation of OCR solutions to ensure high precision and recall rates.

Customization and Configuration:
Customize OCR solutions to meet specific project requirements and handle various document formats.
Configure OCR parameters for optimal performance in different scenarios.

Performance Optimization:
Optimize OCR solutions for performance, scalability, and resource efficiency.
Implement parallel processing and other techniques to improve processing speed.

Documentation:
Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for OCR algorithms, configurations, and integration procedures.
Provide documentation for troubleshooting and support purposes.



Qualifications:


Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience in developing OCR solutions, including algorithm design and integration.
Strong programming skills in languages like Python, Java, or C++.
Knowledge of OCR libraries and frameworks such as Tesseract, ABBYY, Google Cloud Vision API.
Understanding of machine learning concepts related to OCR is a plus.
Familiarity with image processing techniques and formats.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
CONTEXT

Richemont owns some of the world’s leading luxury goods Maisons, with strengths in jewellery, fine watches & premium accessories, including Cartier, Van Cleef & Arpels, Montblanc, Roger Dubuis, Vacheron Constantin, etc.

Richemont has a strong ambition to transform its business model towards New Retail. Part of this transformation is the Group Data Office that, among others, delivers Analytics & Data Science projects for the different Maisons.

The Analytics & Data Science team, belonging to “Group Data Office”, supports this vision by developing analytics and data science use cases, defining best practices across the group, and industrializing analytics & data science solutions. This team is recruiting a Senior Data Scientist to work under the Lead Data Scientist.

Responsibilities


Design & develop complex ML-driven approaches to resolve business problems .
Gather requirements and effectively communicate developed solution to the Business.
Partner with Machine Learning Engineers, Analytics Engineers & IT to deliver solutions.


Academic Background


Graduate in Master program in Engineering, Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, or related fields.


Skills & Experience


Proficient in Python programming language & data-related libraries (6 years +)
Extensive experience in Data Science & Machine Learning (6 years +) in a large variety of topics
Good knowledge in Statistics & SQL
Professional experience in Google Cloud Platform or other cloud platform (2 years +)
Experience in Vertex AI is a plus
Experience in Git + Agile Development is a plus.


Desired Personal Skills


Autonomous, proactive & curious with a strong sense of ownership
Proficiency in English is a must: Strong communication skills, ability to explain complex topics to top-level management.
Quick-learner, able to comprehend & resolve complex problems.
Pragmatic mindset to problem solving, and an ability to think critically and objectively.
Ease to collaborate in multicultural and multifunctional environments.


Show more

Title: FrontEnd Developer - Lisbon/Porto
Description:
We’re looking for the special, unique and amazing YOU!

@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!




We are looking for an Amazing: Angular/React developer

Seniority: Mid Sénior




The amazing you, will have:

Bachelor's and/or master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or similar;
+4 years of experience developing with Angular 2+;
Knowledge in Bootstrap and Material Design would be valued;
Experience with Frontend automation testing;
Desire and skills to be a tech/team lead;
Fluent Portuguese and comfortable with english both written and spoken;
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Be already in Portugal and available to a flexible remote model in Lisbon/Porto




To turn yourself from amazing to unique, you´ll have (plus):

-

Why should you become part of our family?

You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that´s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
Full Onsite projects: if you prefere the company of your colleagues!
Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psicologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days… all remote!




Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Inovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the “Index of Excellence”, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees

Title: Senior Data Scientist
HTML:
Make an impact by working for sectors where technology is the enabler, everything is ground-breaking and there’s a constant need to be innovative.

Be part of the team that combines business knowledge, technological edge and a design experience. Our different backgrounds and know-how are key in developing solutions and experiences for digital clients.

Face challenges and learn other ways of thinking and seeing the world - there’s always room for your energy and creativity.

About The Role

As a Senior Data Scientist, you will be responsible for collaborating closely with pre-sales teams for cross-functional end-client solutions and for designing solutions in ongoing projects. You can also participate in projects as a specialist, ensuring proper solution delivery, monitoring, and governance using MLOps.

As a part of your job, you will:

  • Participate in pre-sales activities related to the Data Science field.
  • Leverage data and domain knowledge to solve business problems and create quantifiable value.
  • Work cross-functionally to define problem statements, define requirements, and design suitable solutions;
  • Lead/Support the development of data-driven optimization models, experiments, forecasting algorithms, and capacity constraint models;
  • Lead teams into delivering models using best MLOps practices;
  • Communicate final recommendations and support decision-making.


What are we looking for?

  • Degree in an analytical field (e.g., Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Operations Research, Management Science);
  • Scripting with one of these languages (e.g., Python, Pyspark, Spark-mllib);
  • Experienced with packages such as NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Dplyr, and Ggplot2;
  • Project experience as a Data Scientist or in a role closely related to data (e.g., Analytics);
  • Experience working with and leading teams in a project environment;
  • Experience in delivering projects using MLOps best practices;
  • Experience in distribution-based architectures such as Cloudera, AWS, Microsoft Azure Cloud, and GCP (Google Cloud Platform), among others.


Personal traits:

Ability to adapt to different contexts, teams and Clients

Teamwork skills but also sense of autonomy

Motivation for international projects and ok if travel is included

Willingness to collaborate with other players

Strong communication skills

We want people who like to roll up their sleeves and open their minds. Believe this is you? Come join the Team!

Celfocus is a European high-tech system integrator, providing professional services focused on creating business value through Analytics and Cognitive solutions – addressing Telecommunications, Energy & Utilities, Financial Services and other markets' strategic opportunities.

Serving Clients in 25+ countries, Celfocus delivers solutions such as accelerating digital network transformation in Autonomous Networks, elevating and monetising business services in B2B2x ecosystems, and providing highly relevant customer experiences through Hyper-personalisation solutions.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.

We're the world's leading data, insights, and consulting company; we shape the brands of tomorrow by better understanding people everywhere.

Worldpanel provides brands and retailers with a unique, 360-degree understanding of consumer behaviour across the globe. We are shopper-centric, continuously monitoring the purchase and usage behaviour through the largest omnipanel in the world. With unparalleled datasets, pioneering technology and expert analysts, we partner with brands and retailers of all sizes, empowering them to reimagine what's possible, and change the landscape to create a better, healthier, more sustainable and inclusive world.

Job Details

Why this job is important

Kantar Worldpanel is seeking a Senior Data Scientist to spearhead transformative initiatives through innovative analytical and AI methodologies, striving to elevate the quality and efficiency of our global services.

In this pivotal role, the ideal candidate will act as the right-hand of the Team Lead, steering strategic direction in key areas of Data Science by developing and supervising the development of deep/machine learning models, collaborating with the engineering team to deploy ML algorithms, maintaining production-level code, implementing data engineering for automated solutions, and exploring new ML methods for efficient data analysis.

If you are passionate about pioneering advances in data science, leading strategic initiatives, and contributing to the global impact of our services, apply for a career that'll be out of the ordinary and join us!

What You'll Be Doing


Leading and mentoring data scientists in the team, fostering team building and implementing best practices throughout projects.
Develop and supervise sophisticated deep/machine learning models and statistical algorithms, deploying novel solutions and efficiently retrieving data for robust model building.
Work collaboratively with the Data Engineering team, seamlessly deploying and integrating Machine Learning (ML) algorithms to improve overall functionality.
Exhibit coding prowess by developing, commenting, maintaining, and sharing legible and production-level computer code, ensuring transparency and reliability.
Apply sophisticated data engineering techniques to deliver automated solutions, exploring new ML methods for the streamlined analysis of large datasets.
Build compelling data visualizations, meticulously documenting and communicating findings to internal stakeholders in a structured and impactful manner.
Drive the delivery of effective solutions by collaborating with internal stakeholders, solving critical business questions, and providing strategic business recommendations from a Data Science perspective.
Take full responsibility for key projects, consistently raising the performance bar and ensuring the highest standards of excellence.
Identify and harness opportunities for applying data science to improve, optimize, and expand existing solutions.


The Skills & Experience Needed As Senior Data Scientist


Academic background (Bachelor's, Master's or PhD Degree) in Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning Engineering, Statistics or equivalent fields.
Business proficiency in English (B2 Level Minimum Required).
Minimum of 5-7 years of proven experience in ML Engineering or Data Science roles.
Experience with the end-to-end Data Science cycle: from data collection to model deployment and monitoring.
Strong data exploratory skills - understand how to break down the data, extract insights, and determine utility within a broad range of business questions.
Proven understanding of commonly used ML/Optimization techniques (Classification, Regression, Clustering, Outlier identification) and statistical methodologies (Distributions, Hypothesis testing, Bayesian framework).
Experience of NLP (Natural Language Programming) models such as BERT, GPT-2, ELMo, RoBERT and CNN.
Experience of sentiment analysis would be hugely beneficial
Consolidated professional programming experience programming in Python, as well as with Spark and SQL, coupled with competence in applying prevalent Data Science and Machine Learning libraries (experience with LLM will be advantageous).
Experience working within Agile Frameworks (SCRUM/KANBAN).

What's In It For You


Flexible hybrid working
Up to 25 days off, plus your birthday off and two days paid for volunteering
Meal card and flexible benefits where you are allocated funds to spend on a variety of benefits such as transport costs, education related and more


We are not able to offer visa sponsorship or assist with relocation support for this role. Please ensure you have the right to work in the country where this role is located before applying.

Country

Portugal

Why join Kantar?

We shape the brands of tomorrow by better understanding people everywhere. By understanding people, we can understand what drives their decisions, actions, and aspirations on a global scale. And by amplifying our in-depth expertise of human understanding alongside ground-breaking technology, we can help brands find concrete insights that will help them succeed in our fast-paced, ever shifting world.

And because we know people, we like to make sure our own people are being looked after as well. Equality of opportunity for everyone is our highest priority and we support our colleagues to work in a way that supports their health and wellbeing. While we encourage teams to spend part of their working week in the office, we understand no one size fits all; our approach is flexible to ensure everybody feels included, accepted, and that we can win together. We're dedicated to creating an inclusive culture and value the diversity of our people, clients, suppliers and communities, and we encourage applications from all backgrounds and sections of society. Even if you feel like you're not an exact match, we'd love to receive your application and talk to you about this job or others at Kantar.
